channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- 3S-Smart CODESYS Gateway Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- 3S-Smart CODESYS Gateway Server

item.title: CVE-2015-6460|2024-08-06T07:22:21.578Z -- codesys -- 3s-smart%20codesys%20gateway%20server
item.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in 3S-Smart CODESYS Gateway Server before 2.3.9.34 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via opcode (1) 0x3ef or (2) 0x3f0.
